content: if you can whip up a granny square you can create this fun crochet dog coat stitched in red heart super saver o go we ve coordinated the colors for you so you know your garment will look great is the color not right for your dog no problem simply choose a different colorway practice chain double_crochet and single_crochet to make granny squares then simply assemble them into a personalized dog coat that s sure to make tails wag yarn for model red heart® super saver® o go™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m sizes s m l xl newsprint 7124 2 2 3 3 o gos materials 2 sets of sew on snap fasteners or hook and loop fasteners to fit chest measurement s 10 25 5 cm m 16 40 5 cm l 19 48 cm xl 24 61 cm
